code: @Test public void testDirectMessage() throws Exception {     Date now = new Date().     String tweet = "Test a tweet posted on " + now.toString().     LOG.info("Tweet: " + tweet).     ProducerTemplate producerTemplate = context.createProducerTemplate().     // send tweet to the twitter endpoint     producerTemplate.sendBody("direct:tweets", tweet).     resultEndpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     resultEndpoint.expectedBodyReceived().body(String.class).     // Message headers should be preserved     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied().     List<Exchange> tweets = resultEndpoint.getExchanges().     assertNotNull(tweets).     assertThat(tweets.size(), is(1)).     String receivedTweet = tweets.get(0).getIn().getBody(String.class).     assertThat(receivedTweet, is(tweet)). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:tweets").to("twitter-directmessage:cameltweet?" + getUriTokens()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
